nodes.text: Drakka's Diner was an eatery in a dangerous region of Shaketown, in the planet Gorse where the Besalisk Drakka worked as a chef.
The location was frequented by Kanan Jarrus as well as other local residents.
When an Imperial Lambda-class T-4a shuttle landed in front of the place, Drakka had to close it for an entire day. The diner was destroyed when the Imperial shuttle exploded.
